Uses of Interface
nl.esciencecenter.xenon.jobs.Job

  • Packages that use Job 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.xenon.jobs
    This package contains the classes and interfaces used to run jobs.

    • Uses of Job in nl.esciencecenter.xenon.jobs

      Methods in nl.esciencecenter.xenon.jobs that return Job 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Job Streams.getJob()
      Get the job for which this Streams was created.
      Job JobStatus.getJob()
      Get the job for which this JobStatus was created.
      Job[] Jobs.getJobs(Scheduler scheduler, String... queueNames)
      Get all jobs currently in (one ore more) queues of scheduler.
      Job Jobs.submitJob(Scheduler scheduler, JobDescription description)
      Submit a job to a Scheduler.
      Methods in nl.esciencecenter.xenon.jobs with parameters of type Job 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JobStatus Jobs.cancelJob(Job job)
      Cancel a job.
      JobStatus Jobs.getJobStatus(Job job)
      Get the status of a Job.
      JobStatus[] Jobs.getJobStatuses(Job... jobs)
      Get the status of all specified jobs.
      Streams Jobs.getStreams(Job job)
      Returns the standard streams of a job.
      JobStatus Jobs.waitUntilDone(Job job, long timeout)
      Wait until a job is done or until a timeout expires.
      JobStatus Jobs.waitUntilRunning(Job job, long timeout)
      Wait for as long a job is waiting in a queue, or until a timeout expires.
